title: Beef Stroganoff for Instant Pot Recipe
description: This Instant Pot beef stroganoff gives you big, slow-cooked flavor in a fraction of the usual time. Cooking egg noodles right in the gravy is brilliant.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Beef Beef Stroganoff Recipes Beef Stroganoff for Instant Pot 4.5 (982) 749 Reviews 193 Photos Instant Pot beef stroganoff is truly a one-pot meal! Fork-tender beef and mushrooms are cooked with the egg noodles. Submitted by Lissa Updated on July 16, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 193 193 193 193 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 35 mins Additional Time: 5 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 2 tablespoons canola oil ½ onion, diced 2 teaspoons salt, divided 2 pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 3 cloves garlic, minced ½ teaspoon dried thyme 2 tablespoons soy sauce 3 cups chopped mushrooms 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 3 cups chicken broth 1 (16 ounce) package wide egg noodles ¾ cup sour cream, or to taste Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as an Instant Pot) and select Sauté function. Heat oil for 1 minute. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add onion and 1/2 teaspoon salt to pot; cook and stir until onion begins to soften, 3 to 4 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle beef with 1 teaspoon salt and the pepper. Add to the pot. Cook and stir until beef is evenly browned, about 2 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add garlic and thyme; cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour in soy sauce. Stir mushrooms into the pot. Stir in flour until incorporated. Stir in chicken broth and remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Close and lock the lid. Set to high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions for 10 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Open pot; stir in egg noodles. Close and lock the lid. Set to high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions for 5 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Release pressure naturally for 5 minutes according to manufacturer's instruction. Release remaining pressure using the quick-release method. Open pressure cooker; stir in sour cream. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 2,783 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 536 Calories 26g Fat 45g Carbs 29g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 536 % Daily Value * Total Fat 26g 34% Saturated Fat 10g 49% Cholesterol 121mg 40% Sodium 1313mg 57% Total Carbohydrate 45g 16% Dietary Fiber 2g 9% Total Sugars 2g Protein 29g 58% Vitamin C 2mg 2% Calcium 60mg 5% Iron 5mg 26% Potassium 503mg 11% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Beef Stroganoff for Instant Pot 01 of 193 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 193 Photo by  KindJelly1573 09/06/2022 Used Better than Bouillion Beef and 1/3 more the amount of liquid and noodles (Family of five) Currently waiting on NR but it smells wonderful. Probably should have added a bit more liquid but it looks great. 03 of 193 Photo by  David Pless 03/19/2022 Delicious. I simplified the steps some.Once the onions are sauteed dump all the ingredients save the egg noodles into the pot at once. It turns out basically the same weather you sear the beef first or at the salt in stages vs dumping it all in at once. 04 of 193 Photo by  Dee Cohen 08/01/2021 I added peas - soo yummy! Definitely would recommend this recipe ! 05 of 193 Photo by  Shannon 06/29/2021 06 of 193 Photo by  Chef Mo 06/24/2021 I felt like it needed more flavors, but the recipe cooked everything perfect. 07 of 193 Photo by  caldwell3004 06/20/2021 So far so good!! I made it per instructions first except omitting the mushrooms because my husband does not like them. But I did make a side dish of sautéed asparagus, mushrooms and onions 08 of 193 Photo by  caldwell3004 06/20/2021 So far so good!! I made it per instructions first except omitting the mushrooms because my husband does not like them. But I did make a side dish of sautéed asparagus, mushrooms and onions 09 of 193 Photo by  Marc Jarett 05/23/2021 Great recipe, I added a few extra cloves because you can never have to much garlic! 10 of 193 Photo by  JoeyG 04/22/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Instant Pot Beef and Noodles 3 Ratings Simple Hamburger Stroganoff 1,107 Ratings Instant Pot Lasagna 29 Ratings Instant Pot Mac and Cheese with Ham and Peas 71 Ratings Best Home-Style Beef Stroganoff 18 Ratings Rich and Creamy Beef Stroganoff 997 Ratings Easy Beef Stroganoff in the Slow Cooker 49 Ratings Instant Pot Ground Beef Stroganoff 41 Ratings Chef John's Classic Beef Stroganoff 758 Ratings Creamy Beef Tips with Egg Noodles 43 Ratings So Simple Beef Stroganoff 184 Ratings Beef Lo Mein Noodles 3 Ratings No Sour Cream Beef Stroganoff 124 Ratings Beef Stroganoff Casserole 2 Ratings Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff 4,213 Ratings Hamburger Stroganoff 70 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
